title: Integrative Health | Ohio State Wexner Medical Center
description: Here is some information from The Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center I wanted to share with you.
sitename: The Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center
cleaned_text: Ohio State Integrative Health heals the whole person We offer the best of both conventional and complementary medicine to promote optimal health, prevent and treat disease and meet each patient's unique physical, emotional and spiritual health goals. A key feature is our Integrative Health Clinic, which provides a rich scope of services and educational opportunities rarely found in traditional medical centers. Our nationally recognized practitioners include nurses, physicians, massage therapists and chiropractors with expertise in pediatrics, nutrition therapy, [Ayurveda](/integrative-health/services/ayurveda), Chinese medicine and many other fields. With public interest in complementary health care continuing to grow, we offer acupuncture, mind-body medicine, including meditation and many other nontraditional therapies. We also provide convenient access to the world-renowned scientists and clinicians at The Ohio State University Wexner Medical Center. Classes designed for your well-being Ohio State Integrative Health offers a wide variety of classes that enhance your physical, emotional, mental, spiritual and social well-being - including tai chi, meditation and beginner and advanced yoga. Comprehensive treatmentsOhio State's specially trained physicians and practitioners blend complementary and conventional treatments and therapies to heal the mind, body and spirit. [Learn about our services](/integrative-health/services) Our TeamThe Division of Integrative Health boasts a wide array of nationally recognized practitioners.
